<b>Permitto</b> -<b>is</b> -<b>isi</b> -<b>issum</b> -<b>ere</b>   <p> <b>1</b> &ensp; <small>Col.</small> &ensp; mandar, enviar. <br> <b>2</b> &ensp; <small>Cic.</small> &ensp; permittir, conceder, deixar fazer. <br> <b>3</b> &ensp; <small>Caes.</small> &ensp; arremessar, arrojar. <br> <b>4</b> &ensp; <small>Sisen. apud Non.</small> &ensp; percipitar. <br> <b>5</b> &ensp; <small>Cic.</small> &ensp; commetter, confiar, encarregar. </p>   <p><small>[EXEMPLOS]</small><br> <br><b>X</b><br>permittere equum in hostem &ensp; <small><small>Liv</small></small> &ensp; <small>Arremessar, ou fazer correr o cavallo contra o inimigo</small> </p>
